measured_by: Adapted Language Experience and Proficiency Questionnaire (LEAP-Q)
justification: "We used the adapted Language Experience and Proficiency Questionnaire (LEAP-Q)… to collect information about participants' proficiency, use, and language acquisition."

measured_by: number of obtained ECTS credits / overall average grade during studies
justification: "…the data about the overall average grade and the number of ECTS was collected as an approximation of the L2 proficiency measure."

measured_by: five-point Likert scale for profundity ratings
justification: "Participants rated the profoundness of all statements on a five-point Likert scale (1 - not at all profound … 5 - definitely profound)."
"Participants rated the statements for emotional valence and imageability, and the statements differed by emotional valence…"
"Participants rated the statements for emotional valence and imageability… mundane statements were evaluated as more imaginable than the bullshit statements."
